text.font-family: NHaasGroteskDSPro-25Th, Neue Haas Grotesk Display Pro
NHaasGroteskDSPro-25Th, Neue Haas Grotesk Display Pro

text.data-name: Happy Camper was my very first school project on the interaction design study. The assignment was to design an app for tourists visiting Oslo. As this was an individual project, I designed the app from ideation to the high fidelity prototype.
text.font-family: NHaasGroteskDSPro-45Lt, Neue Haas Grotesk Display Pro
text.tspan: Happy Camper was my very first school project on the interaction design study. The assignment was
to design an app for tourists visiting Oslo. As this was an individual project, I designed the app from
ideation to the high fidelity prototype.

text.data-name: Over the summer of 2020, more Norwegians than ever discovered their own country by car. As a tourist traveling and living out of your car, your priorities and needs are different from tourists staying at hotels. Basic tasks such as getting water, accessing
text.font-family: NHaasGroteskDSPro-45Lt, Neue Haas Grotesk Display Pro
text.tspan: Over the summer of 2020, more Norwegians than ever discovered their own country by car. As a
tourist traveling and living out of your car, your priorities and needs are different from tourists staying
at hotels. Basic tasks such as getting water, accessing toilets, taking a shower and finding a suitable
spot to park for the night can be challenging, and your normal Oslo guides don’t help much. I wanted
to create an app that covers your needs and wishes as well as betters your experience as a camper

text.font-family: NHaasGroteskDSPro-45Lt, Neue Haas Grotesk Display Pro
NHaasGroteskDSPro-45Lt, Neue Haas Grotesk Display Pro
NHaasGroteskDSPro-45Lt, Neue Haas Grotesk Display Pro

text.data-name: Surveys, interviews, creating personas, mood boarding, concept development, sketching, wire framing, prototyping.
text.font-family: NHaasGroteskDSPro-45Lt, Neue Haas Grotesk Display Pro
text.tspan: Surveys, interviews, creating personas, mood boarding, concept development,
